properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v4 v5

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I love You
Sisters: I love You
Because You first loved me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I love you
Sisters: I love You
Because You first loved me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And this is love
that You loved us
and sent Your Son
I love you
Sisters: I love You
Because you first loved me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We love Him
Sisters: We love Him
Because He first loved us

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And this is love
that He loved us
and sent His Son
We Love Him
Sisters: We Love Him
Because He first loved us.
